EmailTemplate.name: CR 1.3 Application submitted (2016)
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge - thank you for submitting your application!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact the Staffing Team on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting an application to work on the 2016 NCS autumn programme!
We will start reviewing applications from January, and from that point, we will aim to respond to all applications within 2 working weeks. If you have not heard back from us by 18 January 2016, please get in touch with your local staffing team, or email us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
Thanks again for taking the time to apply, and for your interest in The Challenge and the NCS programme!
Best wishes,
The Staffing Team The Challenge seasonalroles@the-challenge.org
